mapper.select:
select t1.DOC_ID as docId , t1.DOC_ACCOUNT as docAccount , t1.STATUS as status , t2.INFO_ID as infoId , t2.DOC_NAME as docName , t2.DOC_PIC as docPic , t3.HOP_NAME as hopName , t4.LOC_NAME as locName , t5.NAME as docTitle
from DOC_USER t1 left join DOC_INFO t2 on t1.DOC_ID=t2.DOC_ID left join APP_HOP t3 on t2.DOC_HOPID=t3.HOP_ID left join APP_LOC t4 on t2.DOC_LOCID=t4.LOC_ID left join sys_dictionaries t5 on t2.DOC_TITLE=t5.DICTIONARIES_ID
